lines.text:
[trying to find out who's behind Turk 182]
Just give us the names and addresses of everyone involved.
Everyone?
Everyone involved.
There's the Penguin, the Riddler, Catwoman, Darth Vader, Jack the Ripper, Atila the Hun...

If I see one more of this Turk messages that is bigger than a postage stamp, you are going to spend the rest of your career - I swear before God - pounding the beat in the South Bronx! Is that clear, Ryan?
My brother ain't no drunk. He's my blood.

[after Turk has broken into the mayor's office]
Why, officer Callahan. What a pleasant surprise. So glad you could make it. Where the hell were you?
There was a fire in the bathroom.

A fire in the bathroom. You leave the mayor's office unguarded for a fire in the bathroom? Jesus Christ, Callahan. That trick's in my kid's commando game! You'd better get yourself a new pair of shoes, Callahan.
I'm... gonna be... doing a lot of walking?

[nods]
Smart man. Have a nice day.

[about Turk 182]
There are two theories. The first is that this is an organized conspiracy. The other more bizarre theory is that this is the work of one man - Superman, apparently!
You read the newspapers, Jock?
Of course I read the newspapers. What do I look like, an imbecile?
Uh... no.
Now just what do we know about this Turk? Or, if there are more than one, we could call them Turkeys.

[the cops are looking at slides of Turk's graffiti]
This little masterpiece was conducted while the surrogate court was in night session. If you can believe that one.
Justice is indeed blind.

[after Ryan has fired his gun at the power grid to the bridge]
Stupid flatfoot. Never heard of auxillary power?
[he turns the backup generator on]

[yelling]
Next time you better bring a fucking bazooka, you stupid son of a bitch!
